ingredients: 1  watermelon rind, peeled, 4 cups water, 4 cups white sugar,   +   1/2 cup spearmint leaves, coarsely chopped, 1 tablespoon dried sweet basil
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 11mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 94g 34%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 67g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 37mg 183%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 464mg 10%
